CustomField.description: Captures the relationship to the Location Address. Secondary relationship. Contains a lookup filter to the Location: Location Status = Active.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the relationship to the Location Address. Secondary relationship. Filter to only display "Active" Location Addresses.
CustomField.label: Location Address

lookupFilter.errorMessage: No "Active" Location Addresses meets the search criteria. Please search for an alternate "Active" Location Address record or create a new one.
